entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY, Red Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:09 p.m. EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or light snow changing to periods of light snow overnight. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 8:06 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:06 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023
